mapper.select: select sd.*,s.stock_name, s.qty remain_qty from sale_details sd LEFT JOIN stock s ON sd.stock_id = s.stock_id where sale_id = #{sale_id}
mapper.insert:
insert into sale_details (sale_id, stock_id, qty, price_per_unit, total_price) values
(#{item.sale_id}, #{item.stock_id}, #{item.qty}, #{item.price_per_unit}, #{item.total_price})
mapper.select: SELECT sd.stock_id, st.stock_name, SUM(sd.total_price) AS total_price_sum FROM sale_details sd JOIN sale s ON sd.sale_id = s.sale_id JOIN stock st ON sd.stock_id = st.stock_id WHERE s.status = 2 AND s.order_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY sd.stock_id, st.stock_name ORDER BY total_price_sum DESC LIMIT 5
